mapper.select: /* com.neofect.gts.services.sm.repository.AuthProgramRepository.AuthProgramE01 */ SELECT A.SYS_ID, A.PGM_CODE, replace(A.PGM_NAME,',',' ') as PGM_NAME, A.PGM_URL, A.SHOW_TAG, A.MOVE_BTN_TAG, A.UPDATE_TAG, A.RETRIEVE_TAG, A.INSERT_TAG, A.APPEND_TAG, A.DUPLICATE_TAG, A.DELETE_TAG, A.PRINT_TAG, A.EXCEL_TAG, A.CLOSE_TAG, A.OTHER_BTN, A.WEB_TAG, A.DEVELOPED_TAG, A.CRITERIA, A.REMARK, A.SORT_CODE, A.SORT_ORDER, A.HELP_TAG, A.PAGE_LINK FROM SM_AUTH_PGMCODE A WHERE A.SYS_ID LIKE #{sysId} AND ( A.PGM_CODE LIKE #{pgmNm} OR A.PGM_NAME LIKE #{pgmNm} ) ORDER BY A.SYS_ID, A.PGM_CODE
/* com.neofect.gts.services.sm.repository.AuthProgramRepository.AuthProgramS01 */ SELECT A.PGM_CODE FROM SM_AUTH_PGMCODE A WHERE A.PGM_CODE = #{pgmcode}

/* com.neofect.gts.services.sm.repository.AuthProgramRepository.MyPgmListS01 */ SELECT B.PGM_CODE, B.PGM_NAME, DECODE(LENGTH(B.PGM_CODE),2,1,4,2,6,3,7,3,4) as PGM_LEVEL, B.SYS_ID as SYS_DIV, B.PGM_URL as TEMP_TYPE, '' as CONN_URL, CASE WHEN LENGTH(B.PGM_CODE)>=6 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END as END_MENU_YN, B.SHOW_TAG as SHOW_YN, 'N' as POPUP_YN, 'Y' as MULTI_YN, B.RETRIEVE_TAG as QUERY_YN, B.APPEND_TAG as APPEND_YN, B.INSERT_TAG as INSERT_YN, B.DELETE_TAG as DELETE_YN, B.UPDATE_TAG as UPDATE_YN, B.PRINT_TAG as PRINT_YN, B.EXCEL_TAG as EXCEL_YN, A.AUTH_I as INSERT_AUTH, A.AUTH_D as DELETE_AUTH, A.AUTH_I as UPDATE_AUTH, A.AUTH_P as PRINT_AUTH, A.AUTH_P as EXCEL_AUTH FROM SM_AUTH_USER_MENU A INNER JOIN SM_AUTH_PGMCODE B ON (A.SYS_ID = B.SYS_ID AND A.PGM_CODE = B.PGM_CODE) WHERE A.AUTH_CODE = #{authCode} AND ( A.AUTH_I='Y' OR A.AUTH_R='Y' OR A.AUTH_D='Y' OR A.AUTH_P='Y' ) AND B.SHOW_TAG = 'Y' ORDER BY B.PGM_CODE
